about_the_game:
A Short Description 

Swan Song is a relaxing puzzle game about building your own music scales. Your grandpa left you with a small magical music box. It's up to you to solve it and reveal its secrets. Puzzle your way through numerous levels by placing notes on the scale and cranking the box. Watch your composition come to life when the box starts playing your musical score which moves & twists the gears & platforms, in order to get your little Goose safely to its nest!

The Story

Your grandpa Greg recently passed away. He was an extraordinary toymaker who was well known all over the world. After the funeral, you go to his old home to reminisce about the past. When walking around the attic, your eye suddenly falls upon a small music box with a letter beside it. Could this music box be his final gift to you? His Swan Song?

What to expect

  • 23 fun levels to break your brain

  • Relaxing music & atmosphere (music by Jamal Green)

  • A silly Goose (because geese are cooler than swans)!
